sentence: In early trading on Friday, shares of Boeing ( BA ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 0.8%.
Year to date, Boeing registers a 21.5% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Verizon Communications ( VZ ), trading down 0.7%.
Verizon Communications is showing a gain of 3.1% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Home Depot ( HD ), trading down 0.5%, and Chevron Corporation ( CVX ), trading up 0.7% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
